title: Goth Teen “Jack the Ripper”
description:
When 52-year-old Pamela Vitale was brutally beaten to death in a sleepy suburb of San Francisco, everyone in the neighborhood became a suspect. Was Scott Dyleski, the 16-year-old boy next door, a misunderstood goth, or a psychopathic serial killer in training?


Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
